description: This file is a Python script that sets up a logging utility by importing an external logging module, extending system path to include a parent directory, and defining a function to create and return a logger instance.

methods.name: Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False)
methods.description: Creates and returns a logger instance from an external logging module with specified configuration options.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(name, verbose = False, show_warnings = True, show_doc_issues = False):$/
